bobby.engine.bobengine

Class BobRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bobby.engine.bobengine.BobRenderer

  • public class BobRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles updating and rendering for it's BobView owner.
    Author:
    Ben

    • Method Detail

      • setOwner

        public void setOwner(BobView newOwner)
        Sets the BobView associated with this BobRenderer.
        Parameters:
        newOwner - - BobView associated with this renderer.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(float red,
                               float green,
                               float blue,
                               float alpha)
        Sets the background color for the BobView.
        Parameters:
        red - - Red value from 0 to 1
        green - - Green value from 0 to 1
        blue - - Blue value from 0 to 1
        alpha - - Alpha value from 0 to 1

      • onSurfaceCreated

        public void onSurfaceCreated(GL10 gl,
                             EGLConfig config)
        Set up the surface.

        This method will load the textures, enable effects we need, disable effects we don't need, set up the client state for drawing the quads.

      • onDrawFrame

        public void onDrawFrame(GL10 gl)
        Execute a frame.

        This method will update game logic and update the graphics.

      • onSurfaceChanged

        public void onSurfaceChanged(GL10 gl,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Handle changes such as orientation changes. This also happens when the surface is created.

        This method will set the background color, set the viewport, remove perspective.

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        The app is resumed from being paused.

        This method will reset the average delta time, resume the game.
